testcase.title: Verify the display of All Fields field type for WoSCC collection

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"

substeps.message: The search fields list contains the expected field All Fields
The All fields search option is not displayed after Author or Author Identifiers field

steps.title: I verify the display of field "All Fields" from search fields dropdown list for row "1"
